body:
> Does this relate to the front end? i.e. do we want to remove/disable the 'enabled' field in the recipe form until approved? Do we need to change the language to be Published instead of Enabled ? e.g. Draft -> Approved -> Published?

Based on the mockups in https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/issues/287#issuecomment-261647983, the "enabled" field doesn't exist at all; you can only save a draft revision, publish the latest draft revision, or disable the single published revision.
